scheme_name: Scheme For Award Of Financial Assistance For Education To The Wards Of Beedi/Cine/IOMC/LSDM Workers – Pre & Post-Matric
description: This scheme provides financial assistance to the wards of Beedi, Cine, Iron Ore, Manganese Ore, Chrome Ore (IOMC), and Limestone & Dolomite Mines (LSDM) workers for education from pre-matric to post-matric levels. The scheme aims to support the education of children from these worker communities.
key_features: Scholarships for pre-matric and post-matric education
Implemented by the Ministry of Labour and Employment
Promotes educational access for marginalized worker families

benefits.scholarship_amount: Rs. 250 to Rs. 25,000 per year, depending on class and course
benefits.coverage: School fees, books, uniforms, and other expenses

education_criteria: Students enrolled in classes 1 to 12 or post-matric courses (including ITI, diploma, degree)
Must be studying in recognized institutions
additional_criteria: Parent must be a Beedi, Cine, IOMC, or LSDM worker with at least 6 months of service
Annual family income must not exceed Rs. 1.2 Lakhs (Beedi/Cine) or Rs. 2 Lakhs (IOMC/LSDM)
eligibility.admission_requirement: Enrolled in recognized schools or institutions
institution_criteria: Government or recognized private schools/colleges in India

steps: Register and fill out the application form
application_process.note: Apply within the academic year deadlines

special_notes: Scholarship amount varies by educational level
Renewal requires academic progress and reapplication
Applicable for both school and post-matric education
